name: loki
description: Loki is a horizontally scalable, multi-tenant log aggregation system inspired by Prometheus. It stores and queries logs efficiently, offering Grafana integration and a simple query language for observability.
features: Log Aggregation: Horizontally scalable, Multi-tenant, Efficient storage. Collect logs from all services.
Grafana Integration: Native visualization, Query builder, Dashboards. Explore logs visually.
LogQL: Powerful query language, Label-based filtering, Metrics extraction. Find what you need quickly.
Cost-Effective: Index-free, Object storage, Low overhead. Affordable log management at scale.
